data.name: Ukko & Guará: Stellarbound
data.detailed_description:
Ukko is a reindeer from Finland and Guará is a maned-wolf from Brazil. One ordinary day, a shooting star falls into planet Earth breaking itself into two parts. The star pieces landed at the north and southern hemisphere, being found by each of our heroes.

Join Ukko and Guará on their adventure to reunite the halves of the star and restore its powers while trying to complete many fun puzzles along the way. Beware, as the broken star's power is unstable and has, in some way, influenced the relationship between the characters and their environments.

Discover the connection between them and complete dozens of levels with different puzzles, mechanics and challenges. Be the guide on this incredible journey!

data.short_description: A shooting star enters planet Earth’s atmosphere and breaks in two pieces. Going through puzzles, dealing with different climates while solving challenges, the reindeer Ukko and the maned-wolf Guará must connect the halves of the star to restore its magical power.
